      • waitForStability

        public boolean waitForStability()
        Waits for the stability to be reached. This method may block the caller thread for quite some time depending of the configured grace period and the maximum number of attempt.
        Specified by:
        waitForStability in interface Stability
        Returns:
        whether of not the stability has been reached.
